Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE*  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 4. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR SERGEANT 5. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR STAFF SERGEANT 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 7. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 8. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.4. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY* E. SECTION:  01. NEW ENGLAND (MAINE, NEW HAMPSHIRE, VERMONT, MASSACHUSETTS, RHODE ISLAND, CONNECTICUT) 02. MIDDLE ATLANTIC (NEW YORK, NEW JERSEY, PENNSYLVANIA) 03. EAST NORTH CENTRAL (OHIO, INDIANA, ILLINOIS, MICHIGAN, WISCONSIN) 04. WEST NORTH CENTRAL (MINNESOTA, IOWA, MISSOURI, NORTH DAKOTA, SOUTH DAKOTA, NEBRASKA, KANSAS) 05. SOUTH ATLANTIC (DELAWARE, MARYLAND, NORTH CAROLINA, SOUTH CAROLINA, VIRGINIA, WEST VIRGINIA, DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, FLORIDA, GEORGIA) 06. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL (KENTUCKY, TENNESSEE, ALABAMA, MISSISSIPPI) 07. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL (ARKANSAS, LOUISIANA, OKLAHOMA, TEXAS) 08. MOUNTAIN (MONTANA, IDAHO, WYOMING, COLORADO, NEW MEXICO, ARIZONA, UTAH, NEVADA) 09. PACIFIC (OREGON, CALIFORNIA, WASHINGTON) 10. OUTSIDE U.S. 11. TERRITORIES BELONGING TO THE U.S. 00. NO ANSWER

Q.32. IF YOU WERE SENT INTO ACTUAL FIGHTING RIGHT NOW, HOW DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD DO*  1. I THINK I WOULD DO ALL RIGHT 2. I THINK I WOULD HAVE TROUBLE AT FIRST, BUT AFTER A WHILE I WOULD BE O.K. 3. I DON,T THINK I WOULD DO VERY WELL 4. I HAVEN,T ANY IDEA HOW I WOULD DO 0. NO ANSWER X. CODES 01-04 PRECODED ON QUESTIONNAIRE, OTHER RESPONSES VOLUNTEERED.

Q.33. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS BEST TELLS THE WAY YOU FEEL ABOUT GETTING INTO THE FIGHTING*  01. I AM READY TO GO AND I WANT TO GET INTO THE REAL FIGHTING SOON 02. I WOULD LIKE TO GET IN ON THE FIGHTING BEFORE IT IS OVER, BUT I DON,T THINK I AM READY YET 03. I HOPE I WON,T HAVE TO GO, BUT IF I DO, I THINK I WILL DO ALL RIGHT 04. I HOPE I WON,T HAVE TO GO BECAUSE I DON,T THINK I WILL EVER BE GOOD AS A FIGHTER 05. NOT PHYSICALLY FIT OR TOO OLD 06. AFTER FURLOUGH WILLING TO GO 07. GO IF ORDERED (OR SIMILAR ANSWER) 08. READY TO GO AS NON-COMBAT 09. READY TO GO WITH TRAINING IN COMBAT 10. MAKES NO DIFFERENCE, DON,T KNOW OR UNDECIDED 11. ALL OTHERS NOT CLASSIFIED ABOVE 12. NO ANSWER 00. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.34A. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE WOULD YOU RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE GERMANS OR WOULD YOU RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE JAPANESE*  1. I WOULD RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE GERMANS 2. I WOULD RATHER BE SENT TO FIGHT THE JAPANESE 3. IT WOULD NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

Q.34B. WHAT ARE THE REASONS FOR YOUR ANSWER*  01. GERMANS MORE CIVILIZED, MORE HUMAN, CLEANER FIGHTERS, NOT AS SAVAGE, OR JAPS LESS CIVILIZED, ETC. 02. EASIER TO BEAT, NOT AS TOUGH FIGHTERS, GIVE UP EASIER 03. HARDER TO BEAT, TOUGHER FIGHTERS 04. PERSONAL VINDICTIVENESS - RELATIVES MISTREATED, "I WAS AT PEARL HARBOR" 05. PREFERENCE FOR CLIMATE, TERRAIN, CONDITIONS OF FIGHTING 06. FAMILIARITY WITH THEIR WAYS 07. TRAINED TO FIGHT THEM; HERE IN CPA; CONVENIENCE OF THE SERVICE 08. WAR GUILT; THEY ATTACKED US; THEY STARTED IT; BECAUSE I REMEMBER PEARL HARBOR; DEC. 7, 1941 - NOT MENTIONING PERSONAL EXPERIENCE 09. BOTH OUR ENEMIES; BOTH HAVE TO BE BEATEN BEFORE WAR IS WON 10. MORE THAN ONE REASON GIVEN 11. ALL OTHER AND UNCLASSIFIED 00. NO ANSWER

V.80. LOCATION:  1. SOUTH SIDE - EVERY ORGANIZATION SOUTH OF A STRAIGHT LINE DRAWN BETWEEN KEPUHI PT. AND WAIAHOLE, EXCLUSIVE OF THOSE ORGANIZATIONS WITHIN A FIVE MILE RADIUS OF ALOHA TOWER 2. HONOLULU - ALL ORGANIZATIONS WITHIN A FIVE MILE RADIUS OF ALOHA TOWER 3. NORTH SIDE - ALL ORGANIZATIONS ABOVE LINE DRAWN BETWEEN KEPUHI PT. AND WAIAHOLE, EXCLUSIVE OF THOSE ORGANIZATIONS WITHIN SCHOFIELD AND WHEELER 4. SCHOFIELD - ALL ORGANIZATIONS WITHIN SCHOFIELD OR WHEELER AREA

V.81. RELATIVE ISOLATION FROM OR ACCESSIBILITY TO HONOLULU:  1. VERY ISOLATED - DIFFICULT TRIP TO HONOLULU - NO VARIETY OF ENTERTAINMENT OR RECREATIONAL FACILITIES WITHIN TROOP AREA, AND SMALL TROOP CONCENTRATION 2. SEMI-ISOLATED - FAIRLY DIFFICULT TRIP TO HONOLULU - AT LEAST 45 MINUTES BY MOTOR VEHICLE - NO ADEQUATE OR CONVENIENT BUS OR TRAIN SCHEDULE - AT WRONG HOURS OR LONG WAIT IN LINE FOR TRANSPORTATION; FEW ENTERTAINMENT OR RECREATIONAL FACILITIES WITHIN TROOP AREA; NOT LARGE TROOP CONCENTRATION INCLUDING TROOPS LIVING IN TENTS 3. MEDIUM ACCESSIBLE - EASY TRIP TO HONOLULU - LESS THAN 45 MINUTES BY MOTOR VEHICLE; GOOD ENTERTAINMENT OR RECREATIONAL FACILITIES; FAIRLY ADEQUATE BUS OR TRAIN SCHEDULE; PERMANENT OR SEMI-PERMANENT LIVING QUARTERS 4. VERY ACCESSIBLE - IN HONOLULU OR VERY LARGE TROOP CONCENTRATION
